challenges.title: Aging Infrastructure
challenges.description: Many Miami Gardens homes were built between the 1960s-1980s and have outdated 100-amp panels, aluminum wiring, or Federal Pacific breakers that pose safety hazards.

challenges.title: Hurricane & Storm Damage
challenges.description: With South Florida's hurricane season, Miami Gardens properties regularly experience power surges, downed lines, and electrical damage requiring emergency repairs.

challenges.title: High Energy Demands
challenges.description: Florida's year-round air conditioning needs strain older electrical systems. Many homes need panel upgrades to handle modern HVAC and appliance loads.

challenges.title: Outdoor & Pool Electrical
challenges.description: Miami Gardens' tropical climate means pools, spas, and outdoor entertainment areas require proper GFCI protection and weatherproof installations.

faqs.question: Do you provide 24/7 emergency electrical service in Miami Gardens?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Miami Gardens neighborhoods including Carol City, Andover, Bunche Park, and surrounding areas. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, or sudden power loss, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Miami Gardens home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Miami Gardens has many homes built in the 1960s-1980s with original electrical panels. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, a 100-amp panel with modern HVAC, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Miami Gardens?

Our services include three-phase power, tenant build-outs, lighting retrofits, and emergency repairs.

seoContent.heading: Trusted Electricians Serving Miami Gardens Since 2003
seoContent.body: Miami Gardens—incorporated in 2003 and now home to over 116,000 residents—is Miami-Dade County's third-largest city. From the excitement of Hard Rock Stadium to the historic campus of Florida Memorial University, this vibrant community deserves electrical service that's equally professional. Solomon Electric has been proud to serve Miami Gardens families and businesses since our founding, building a reputation for honest work, fair pricing, and genuine expertise.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Miami Gardens' Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Miami Gardens presents unique electrical challenges that require local knowledge. Many homes in neighborhoods like Carol City and Andover were built between the 1960s and 1980s—an era of 100-amp panels and aluminum wiring that can't safely support today's HVAC systems, home offices, and modern appliances. Add South Florida's notorious hurricane season and the constant demand of year-round air conditioning, and you have a recipe for electrical stress. Our electricians understand these challenges because we've spent years solving them for your neighbors.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Home
seoContent.body: Whether you need a panel upgrade to power your new EV charger, want to modernize your lighting with energy-efficient LEDs, or require emergency repairs after a storm, Solomon Electric delivers. We handle everything from small outlet repairs to complete home rewiring projects. Every job includes a thorough safety inspection, upfront pricing before work begins, and a satisfaction guarantee. We pull all required Miami-Dade County permits and ensure your electrical work passes inspection.

seoContent.heading: Commercial Electrical Services in Miami Gardens
seoContent.body: Miami Gardens' commercial corridor along NW 27th Avenue and the businesses surrounding Hard Rock Stadium require reliable electrical infrastructure. Solomon Electric provides commercial electrical services including three-phase power installation, lighting retrofits, tenant improvements, code compliance updates, and emergency response for businesses that can't afford downtime. We work around your schedule to minimize disruption to your operations.
